t: Easco Hand Tools - Wikipedia
s: 2 weeks ago - Easco Hand Tools was an American manufacturer of hand tools. It is best known for being the main supplier of mechanic's tools for the Craftsman brand. Its tools were also sold under the Allen and KD Tools brands after its acquisition by Danaher Corporation.

t: Easco Hand Tools - Products, Competitors, Financials, Employees, Headquarters Locations
s: Easco Hand Tools manufactures and markets hand tools. It offers ratchets, sockets and wrenches. The company was founded in 1901 and is based in Hunt Valley, Maryland. In January 1990, Easco Hand Tools was acquired by Danaher.

t: Progress is fine, but it's gone on for too long.: Vanished Tool Makers: Easco
